pkgmetadata.longdescription: Voronoi Diagrams and Heatmaps with 'ggplot2' // Easy creation and manipulation of Voronoi diagrams using 'deldir' with visualization in 'ggplot2'. Convenient functions are provided to create nearest neighbor diagrams and heatmaps. Diagrams are computed with 'deldir' and processed to work with the 'sp' framework. Results are provided in a convenient spatial data structure and displayed with 'ggplot2'. An outline can be provided by the user to specify the spatial domain of interest.
